title: Shorts: The Herdsman
subtitle: Shorts: The Herdsman
summary:
At ORFC in 2020, Georgia shared a story called ‘The Herdsman’, a true story which shows what cheap food is doing to the land, the animals and the people involved in its production. Georgia shares the story here for Farmerama

Georgia talks about the role of myth-making and storytelling in building the regenerative farming movement in Episode 53 of Farmerama

https://georgiawingfieldhayes.org/
https://twitter.com/georgiawingers?lang=en-gb

https://www.theethicaldairy.co.uk
https://www.instagram.com/theethicaldairy/?hl=en


Photo used is from the ethical dairy's instagram feed.
